OC Documentation

The oc library is a completely new implementation of the client side OPeNDAP data retrieval system. It has the following properties.

  • It is completely implemented in C; no C++ is required.
  • It completely replaces the previous OCAPI system.
  • It provides a complete API that does not require knowledge of the internals of OC. This interface was strongly influenced by the netCDF interface.

Version 2.0 introduces a completely new access model that provides a clearer and simpler API.

The oc library was developed by Unidata and the Opendap Consortium under a joint grant funded by the National Science Foundation.

Authors:
Dennis Heimbigner (Unidata)
